purpose.summary: This file is the source input for the IMS PSBGEN utility to generate the Program Specification Block (PSB) named DLIGSAMP for a COBOL language program. It defines one database PCB (PAUTBPCB) for the IMS hierarchical database DBDNAME=DBPAUTP0 with PROCOPT=GOTP and KEYLEN=14, including sensitive segments PAUTSUM0 (root, PARENT=0) and PAUTDTL1 (PARENT=PAUTSUM0). It also defines two GSAM PCBs for sequential datasets PASFLDBD and PADFLDBD, each with PROCOPT=LS.

inputs.name: DBPAUTP0
inputs.description: IMS hierarchical database accessed via PCB named PAUTBPCB with PROCOPT=GOTP and KEYLEN=14; sensitive segments are PAUTSUM0 (PARENT=0) and PAUTDTL1 (PARENT=PAUTSUM0)

inputs.name: PASFLDBD
inputs.description: GSAM dataset accessed via unnamed PCB with PROCOPT=LS

inputs.name: PADFLDBD
inputs.description: GSAM dataset accessed via unnamed PCB with PROCOPT=LS
